name: Cowboy Stuff - Complete Version
description:
A rules lite, hopepunk, alternative western rpg.

You are the "white hats". You fight in this West to make life better for everyone. Bring down the exploiters, the predators, the oppressors, the slave owners etc.

In this alternative West every race, creed, sexuality and gender is equal to fight and bring down the oppressors and the exploiters.

This version is the core rules with optional rules and a mini setting folded in.  The document has also been spruced up for ease of use.

The main rules are still going to be available at a pwyw level on my page.
